review: Arrived in 2 days and took about 3 minutes to connect.  Watch the tutorial before you get too far into it.  Greta value for the price.  Would have been 5 stars if only more "prime choices.

review: Works great, wish i had gotten on sooner
author: Judy Ann Premo "Winter"

review: It's OK. Cancelled my Netflix account before signing up for Prime. Prime video app for Android doesn't work well. To many Amazon apps to access before you can play video. The "free instant"  video selection is small, mostly B grade or older movies. Only Amazon content on firestorm or added cost for additional content (Hulu. Etc). Doesn't want to play files from phone  like Chromecast. It's OK. Don't give up cable, dish or Netflix for it though.
author: Vince Taylor

review: Had to update my speak on my wifi. Took a few tries with the cable company before info could start watching  without it stopping.
author: Enid Pinto
